code:
sequenceDiagram participant A as Computadora A
(Retail_Inventory) participant S as Switch
(Retail_CustomerLoyalty) participant B as Computadora B
(Retail_Inventory) participant C as Computadora C
(Retail_CouponSystem) participant D as Computadora D
(Retail_OrderManagement) Note over S: Tabla MAC vacía Note over A,D: FASE 1: ARP Request (Retail_CustomerLoyalty) A->>S: ARP Request
Origen: A (Retail_OrderManagement)
Destino: Broadcast (Retail_Inventory) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 1 → MAC de A S->>B: ARP Request (Retail_OrderManagement) S->>C: ARP Request (Retail_PointOfSale) S->>D: ARP Request (Retail_Inventory) Note over B,D: Solo C responde al ARP Note over A,D: FASE 2: ARP Response C->>S: ARP Response
Origen: C (Retail_PointOfSale)
Destino: A (Retail_CouponSystem) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 3 → MAC de C S->>A: ARP Response (Retail_CustomerLoyalty) Note over A,D: FASE 3: Comunicación Directa A->>S: Datos para C
Origen: A (Retail_Inventory)
Destino: C (Retail_OrderManagement) Note over S: Consulta tabla MAC
Encuentra C en puerto 3 S->>C: Datos (Retail_CouponSystem)
